verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, These <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded, <S%H6680><s%> that ye should do <S%H6213><s%> them.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done, <S%H6213><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> to you a holy <S%H6944><s%> day, a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>
Ye shall kindle <S%H1197><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> your habitations <S%H4186><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> ye from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> you an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> is of a willing <S%H5081><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> let him bring <S%H935><s%> it, <S%H853><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and brass, <S%H5178><s%>
And blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair,
And rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%>
And oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> and spices <S%H1314><s%> for anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%>
And onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and for the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> among you shall come, <S%H935><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded; <S%H6680><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> <S%H853><s%> his tent, <S%H168><s%> and his covering, <S%H4372><s%> <S%H853><s%> his taches, <S%H7165><s%> and his boards, <S%H7175><s%> <S%H853><s%> his bars, <S%H1280><s%> <S%H853><s%> his pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and his sockets, <S%H134><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The ark, <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof, with <S%H853><s%> the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%> and the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering, <S%H4539><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The table, <S%H7979><s%> and his staves, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the shewbread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H6440><s%>
The candlestick <S%H4501><s%> also for the light, <S%H3974><s%> and his furniture, <S%H3627><s%> and his lamps, <S%H5216><s%> with the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%>

And the incense <S%H7004><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> and his staves, <S%H905><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> at the entering in <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> with his <S%H834><s%> brazen <S%H5178><s%> grate, <S%H4345><s%> <S%H853><s%> his staves, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> <S%H853><s%> his pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and their sockets, <S%H134><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The cloths <S%H899><s%> of service, <S%H8278><s%> to do service <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister in the priest's office. <S%H3547><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they came, <S%H935><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up, <S%H5375><s%> and every one <S%H3605><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> made willing, <S%H5068><s%> and they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the work <S%H4399><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> his service, <S%H5656><s%> and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments. <S%H899><s%>

And they came, <S%H935><s%> both men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> as many as <S%H3605><s%> were willing <S%H5081><s%> hearted, <S%H3820><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> bracelets, <S%H2397><s%> and earrings, <S%H5141><s%> and rings, <S%H2885><s%> and tablets, <S%H3558><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold: <S%H2091><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> offered <S%H5130><s%> offered an offering <S%H8573><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> with <S%H854><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair, and red <S%H119><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> and badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> them.

Every one <S%H3605><s%> that did offer <S%H7311><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> offering: <S%H8641><s%> and every man, <S%H3605><s%> with <S%H854><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> of the service, <S%H5656><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> it.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> that were wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> did spin <S%H2901><s%> with their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> that which they had spun, <S%H4299><s%> both <S%H853><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and of purple, <S%H713><s%> and <S%H853><s%> of scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and of fine linen. <S%H8336><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred them up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> <S%H853><s%> goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair.

And the rulers <S%H5387><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set, <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and for the breastplate; <S%H2833><s%>
And spice, <S%H1314><s%> and oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> and for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense. <S%H7004><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> a willing offering <S%H5071><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> made them willing <S%H5068><s%> <S%H853><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> for all manner <S%H3605><s%> of work, <S%H4399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be made <S%H6213><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>

And he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in understanding, <S%H8394><s%> and in knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and in all manner <S%H3605><s%> of workmanship; <S%H4399><s%>
And to devise <S%H2803><s%> curious works, <S%H4284><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold, <S%H2091><s%> and in silver, <S%H3701><s%> and in brass, <S%H5178><s%>

And in the cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones, <S%H68><s%> to set <S%H4390><s%> them, and in carving <S%H2799><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> any manner <S%H3605><s%> of cunning <S%H4284><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

And he hath put <S%H5414><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> that he may teach, <S%H3384><s%> both he, <S%H1931><s%> and Aholiab, <S%H171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

Them hath he filled <S%H4390><s%> with wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> all manner <S%H3605><s%> of work, <S%H4399><s%> of the engraver, <S%H2796><s%> and of the cunning workman, <S%H2803><s%> and of the embroiderer, <S%H7551><s%> in blue, <S%H8504><s%> and in purple, <S%H713><s%> in scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and in fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and of the weaver, <S%H707><s%> even of them that do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> and of those that devise <S%H2803><s%> cunning work. <S%H4284><s%>
